DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Behaviour data
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Behaviours performed by cross-fostered A. echinatior ants following experimental Escovopsis infection. For each sub-colony the frequency of behaviours performed by all individuals is noted, together with the proportion of time spent on each and the first four principal components following PCA. Some sub-colonies were excluded from the analysis due to garden loss.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: symbiosis
coevolution
fungus-growing ants
